sourceMeaningMnemonic: You <radical>loiter</radical> around your <radical>master</radical> until he <kanji>depart</kanji>s on a <kanji>journey</kanji>. You have a lot more freedom to do things after your master has departed, so until that time you just loiter about looking busy and staying out of his way.
meaningInfo: Picture yourself loitering around your master’s fancy mansion. You’re pretending to dust things off, but you’re actually just waiting for him to depart on his journey.
readingMnemonic: Finally, it's time for your master's <kanji>journey</kanji> and he calls to you and says, "You are the <ja><reading>王</reading></ja> (<ja>おう</ja>) of the house now. Take care of everything while I'm gone."
readingInfo: Your master has departed! You are the <ja>王</ja> now!
